amendment.description: An amendment numbered 60 printed in the Congressional Record to insert language stating that if the Secretary determines a situation exists in which a delay in executing a drawdown of petroleum products in the Reserve in order to comply with paragraph (1) with increase gas prices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scholten amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 221 (Roll no. 77).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A053) offered by Ms. Scholten.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Scholten amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 221 (Roll no. 77).
